sfQuery: SELECT DISTINCT LOWER(table_name) AS TABLE_NAME, LOWER(column_name) AS COLUMN_NAME ,LOWER(data_type) AS DATA_TYPE FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = 'PUBLIC' ORDER BY TABLE_NAME ASC;
pgQuery: SELECT DISTINCT c.table_name, c.column_name, c.data_type FROM information_schema.columns c JOIN information_schema.tables t ON c.table_schema = t.table_schema AND c.table_name = t.table_name WHERE c.table_schema IN ('public') AND t.table_type = 'BASE TABLE' ORDER BY c.table_name ASC;
